definition: long-legged three-toed black-and-white wading bird of inland ponds and marshes or brackish lagoons
details:
noun
- long-legged three-toed black-and-white wading bird of inland ponds and marshes or brackish lagoons
= synonyms: stiltbird, longlegs, long-legs, stilt plover
- long-legged three-toed wading bird of brackish marshes of Australia
- a column of wood or steel or concrete that is driven into the ground to provide support for a structure
= synonyms: pile, spile, piling
- one of two stout poles with foot rests in the middle
